pitrou commented on a change in pull request #12243:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12243#discussion_r791511838



##########
File path: dev/tasks/tasks.yml
##########
@@ -904,6 +904,8 @@ tasks:
         TEST_DEFAULT: 0
         TEST_INTEGRATION_JAVA: 0
         TEST_{{ target|upper }}: 1
+        PYARROW_TEST_GDB: "OFF"

       Can you add comments explaining why this is disabled?

   [Scheduled] [ec2-t3-xlarge-us-east-2](https://conbench.ursa.dev/compare/runs/b7312fa64122474f90926a9ee7c5bfc0...77919f1fe9384f03b857f977a428e0dd/)
